prTitle: feat: implement candidate management UI components for PTA voting system
prBody:
## Summary

Implements comprehensive candidate management UI components for the PTA voting system admin interface as specified in issue #117. This completes Sprint 2 Task 2 of the candidate management feature.

### New Components
- **CandidateCard**: Reusable candidate display component with photo, name, position, and bio
- **CandidateManagement**: Admin page for complete candidate CRUD operations
- **Admin routing**: Protected routes and navigation for admin users

### Key Features
- ✅ Admin can view all candidates grouped by position (President, VP, Secretary, Treasurer)
- ✅ Add/Edit forms with comprehensive validation and error display
- ✅ Delete confirmation dialog prevents accidental deletions
- ✅ CandidateCard displays photo, name, position, and bio with responsive design
- ✅ Position-based filtering tabs and color-coded badges
- ✅ Admin-only access with proper authentication checks

### Backend API Enhancements
- Added complete CRUD operations for candidate management
- Enhanced data store with update_candidate() and delete_candidate() methods
- Comprehensive form validation with detailed error messages
- Admin authentication middleware integration

### Technical Implementation
- React components with modern hooks and state management
- Tailwind CSS for responsive, accessible design
- Form validation with real-time error feedback
- Protected routing with admin authentication
- RESTful API integration with proper error handling

Closes #117
